direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods adjust the Loan-to-Value (LTV) ratio for loans, but flexibleLoanAdjustLtv is specifically for flexible loans.
flexibleLoanAdjustLtv is dependent on the loan and collateral details set up in flexibleLoanBorrow.
Both methods involve operations on flexible loans, though flexibleLoanRepay handles repayment.
Both methods access and manipulate the LTV adjustment history for flexible loans.
Both methods handle loan-related operations and may require similar exception handling for loan adjustments.
Both methods involve operations related to collateral and loan adjustments.
flexibleLoanAdjustLtv depends on the assets data retrieved by flexibleLoanAssets.
flexibleLoanAdjustLtv depends on the collateral assets data retrieved by flexibleLoanCollateralAssets.
